Translations.Text: Hontoni kono (kuruan) wa, ban'yu no nushi kara no keijidearu
Seijitsuna seirei ga sore o tazusae
anatanokokoroni (kudashita). Sorede anata wa keikoku-sha no 1-ri to naru tame ni
meiryona Arabia no kotoba de (kudasa reta nodearu)
Kono koto wa, sudeni mukashi no keiten no naka ni shirusa rete iru
Isuraeru no shison no gakusha-tachi ga kore o shitte iru koto wa, kare-ra (makka no tashinkyo to) ni totte, hitotsu no shirushide wa nai no ka
Ware ga, moshi kore o Arabu igai no dareka ni keiji shitanaraba
kare ga sore o dokuju shite mo, hitobito wa sore o shinjinakattadearou
Kono yo ni, ware wa tsumibukaimono-tachi no kokoronouchi ni, sore (keiji no ichibu) o haira seta
Sore demo kare-ra wa itamashi chobatsu o miru made wa, kono (kuruan) o shinjinaidearou
Daga sono (chobatsu) wa, kare-ra no kidzukanai-chu ni totsuzen osoikakarudearou
Sonotoki kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa yuyo sa renai nodesu ka' to iou
Sore demo kare-ra wa, ware no chobatsu o isoga seyou to iu no ka
Anata wa do omou no ka, ware ga kare-ra ni iku-nenkan mo (no gense no seikatsu o) kyoraku sa sete mo
nao, kare-ra ni yakusoku sa reta koto (tenbatsu) ga kuru to sureba
kyoraku sa sete moratta koto ga, kare-ra ni tori nani no eki ni narou ka
Ware wa keikoku-sha o (maemotte) tsukawasazu ni ikan naru machi mo horobosanakatta
(Mata) kidzuka se (ta nochi de) nakereba. Ware wa kesshite futona koto o okonau monode wanai
Mata akuma-tachi ga kore (keiji) o motarasu koto mo nai nodearu
Sore wa kare-ra ni fusawashi monode mo naku, mata kare-ra ni wa (son'na) noryoku mo nai
Kare-ra wa, keiji o kiku koto kara tozake rarete iru
Sore de arra to issho ni,-gai no don'na kami ni mo inotte wa naranai.-Sa mo nai to anata mo chobatsu sa reru mono no nakama to narou
Anata no kinshin-sha ni chikai Tsuge shi nasai
Mata anata ni shitagatte shinko suru mono ni wa,(ai no) tsubasa o yasashiku sagete yari nasai
Kare-ra ga anata ni shitagawanainara,`anata gata ga okonau koto wa, watashi ni kakawari wa arimasen.' To itte yaru ga i
Iryoku narabinaku jihibukaki okata ni (ato wa) o makase shi nasai
Anata ga (reihai ni) tatsu no o mite ora reru kata ni
mata sajida suru mono-tachi no ma de no, anata no sho dosa o (mo mite ora reru kata ni)
Hontoni kare wa zen Akira ni shite zenchi de ara reru
Ware wa, akuma-tachi ga dare no ue ni kudaru no ka anata gata ni tsugeyou ka
Kare-ra wa, subete no uso-tsuki no to no ue ni kudaru
(Akuma no hanashi ni) mimiwokasu (-sha) no oku wa uso-tsuki no todearu
Mata shijin-tachi no kotodaga,(akuma ni) 唆 Ka sa reta-sha-tachi (dake) ga, kare-ra ni shitagau
Anata wa, kare-ra ga subete no tanima o samayoi aruku no o minakatta no ka
Mata kare-ra wa, jibun no okonai mo shinai koto o kuchi ni surude wanai ka

Shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu mono, mata arra o oku 唱念 Shi, hakugai sa reta nochi ni wa mizukara o mamoru mono wa betsudearu. Fugi o itta-sha-tachi wa, don'na kawari-kata de, utsurikawatte iku ka o, yagate shiru koto ni narou
